definition: Movement of money between accounts, institutions, or parties without buying/selling securities

positive_examples: I deposited my paycheck into my savings account this morning
She withdrew $200 from the ATM for grocery shopping
The company transferred funds from checking to their investment account
He sent a wire transfer to his daughter studying abroad
They rolled over their 401k to a new employer's plan
The automatic payment for utilities was processed today
negative_examples: She bought 100 shares of Apple stock through her broker
The company issued new bonds to raise capital
He sold his cryptocurrency holdings for a profit
The bank charged a $5 service fee for account maintenance
They applied for a mortgage loan to buy a house
The insurance company paid out a claim after the accident
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SecurityTrading, LoanTransaction, InsuranceClaim, BankingFees
